title: Taj Mahal
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indian restaurant with a section of vegetarian dishes (some vegan). Unlimited rice and nan bread (no egg) included with main entrees. Accommodates special requests. Atmosphere combines Indian ambiance with a bit of old German influence. On the walkplatz of an old german village with small medieval streets and narrow buildings.
